item.title: Karnataka: 25-Year-Old Goes Missing Weeks Before Wedding in Raichur, Police Launch Search
item.description:
<![CDATA[A 25-year-old man from Raichur district has gone missing weeks before his wedding. Despite a 20-day search across Karnataka and neighbouring states, there is no breakthrough. Police have registered a case.
In a distressing incident, a 25-year-old man has gone missing just a month before his wedding, leaving his family in deep anguish. Despite an extensive 20-day search across multiple districts and neighbouring states, there has been no trace of him so far. The family has filed a complaint at t...]]>
item.author: Author, About The Author, Asianet Newsable English
